page.title: 15HEALTH (LAMPHEY)
page.content: Although there are a number of doctors living in Lamphey there is no surgery in the village or in any of ther other villages in the block.The nearest surgery is in Pembroke some two miles away,there area also surgeries in Tenby and Saudersfoot.There is a small cottage hospital with limited facilities in Pembroke Dock,this is staffed by the local G.P.s.For more extensive facilities the residents have to travel to Haverfordwest some ten miles away.The most disturbing aspect is that for children requiring E.N.T. treatment the nearest treatment available is in Carmarthen some thirty miles away.The nearest ambulance station is in Pembroke Dock,three miles away.Dentistry is also to be found in Pembroke whilst the clinics are in Pembroke and Pembroke Dock.
